frontendOrg.overview: Swiggy's frontend org is split between consumer-facing apps (Swiggy App, Instamart) and internal tools (Partner Dashboard, Operations). Heavy focus on React Native for mobile, React for web. Strong emphasis on performance given India's diverse network conditions.

teamStructure.consumerApps: Mobile-first team handling main Swiggy app, Instamart, and web platform
teamStructure.partnerTools: Dashboard and tools for restaurant partners, delivery executives
teamStructure.platform: Design system, shared libraries, performance tooling

frontendOrg.scale: 40M+ monthly active users, 3-5 second load time targets, 150+ cities

interviewDay: Ask about network constraints and target devices
Discuss trade-offs between features and performance
Show awareness of India's diverse connectivity landscape
Demonstrate understanding of food delivery business model

Not asking about business context and user constraints
Focusing on latest tech instead of proven, stable solutions
